title: How will skipping the MYP Certificate and directly doing the IB DP affect my chances of getting admission into good universities in the future? - Quora

response.answer_text: I do not think so. There are 100s of students who do that - taking IB only from 11th grade and complete the IBDP. Studying up to 10th in either State Board or CBSE or ICSE or other curriculum in various countries. They get into top universities in the USA, Canada and Europe.
